sentence: Whether you’re preparing for IELTS or sharpening your business English, every 50-minute lesson that you take with me is tailored to your personal goals, with: IELTS Examiner-trained insight: What actually makes a band 7 or 8 (and what doesn’t) Business English support: Speak and write with clarity and confidence at work Targeted feedback: Straightforward, actionable, and Always time-efficient Workplace-focused language: Meetings, emails, presentations, negotiations Real-world materials for your business & work needs, authentic test papers for your IELTS preparation Clarity and calm before test day — or your next big meeting Who it’s for • IELTS test-takers who want to achieve their target band score without wasting months on guesswork • Professionals who need better English for work: meetings, reports, emails, presentations • Anyone who prefers honest feedback and accurate assessment over vague encouragement.
